constituent: topic, just so, sun, day, mend, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: In many kinds of research, one can find information on a given topic only if the headings are prepared just so.
hint: adjust the gap between 2 headings to be just so
koohiiStory1: The "TOPIC" of the day´s newspaper must be placed JUST SO at the top of the PAGE to attract attention.
koohiiStory2: You spend ALL DAY, mending your socks JUST SO. Then you have a look at the HEADING of the newspaper. The topic---FREE SOCKS TO BE GIVEN AWAY!!!!
myStory: chủ đề. trang nói chỉ vậy, chung chung về chủ đề
